SummaryEnglish: Eight-year-old Doremi Harukaze aspires to be a user of magic, as she believes it would solve all her problems and help her confess to a boy she liked. One afternoon, she comes upon a magic shop and correctly suspects that the shop owner is a witch. The shop owner becomes a Witch Frog, "greenling", as this happens to witches when their true identities are discovered. In order to retain her original form, the shop owner, Majo Rika, takes Doremi as her apprentice to turn her into a witch. Doremi must take nine witch exams at night to become an official witch; however, she must never let her own identity as a witch be found out or the same fate that befell Majo Rika will happen to her.

1.TitleEnglish: Movie 1: Pop and the Queen's Cursed Rose
1.SummaryEnglish: Pop has just passed one of her witch exams, but gets into a heated argument with Doremi because Hana followed her into the Witch World. Initially unbeknownst to everyone, the flower Pop brought home from the Witch World is really the Witch Queen Heart, the Queen's favorite flower, which grants any wish it hears regardless of any possible dangers until it begins to bear seeds. One of the wishes it had granted involves turning Doremi into a mouse, unknowingly made by Pop over her anger towards Doremi. While Pop goes to search for her sister, the other girls track down the runaway flower before it starts to reproduce.

2.TitleEnglish: Movie 2: The Secret of the Frog Stone
2.SummaryEnglish: During Doremi and her friends' summer vacation, they visit her grandparents in the fictional mountains of Fukuyama, where they hear of a mysterious legend of Mayuri and Zenjuro, two star-crossed lovers that died in the Edo period. During the next morning, when they investigate the forest, the girls get lost and face the Curse of the Full Moon, which makes them unable to use magic. Meanwhile, due to a traumatizing memory, Aiko develops a fear of Doremi's grandfather.

3.SummaryEnglish: 27-year-old Tokyo office worker Mire Yoshizuki just returned to Japan, while 22-year-old fourth-year college student Sora Nagase aspires to be a teacher, and 20-year-old boyish Reika Kawatani is a part-time Hiroshima okonomiyaki shop worker and freelancer. What draws together these three women from completely different walks of life is a magic gem. A "New Magical Story" begins when they are mysteriously brought together by chance and embark on a journey.

4.TitleEnglish: MAHO-Dou CD Collection Part 2: Screen Theme & Secret ♥ Story

5.SummaryEnglish: At MAHO-dou, Hazuki wonders why Doremi is so moody, which the latter replies that she is unhappy with the sudden change in the art-style from their lovely teenage selves (in the novel) to the current cartoonish style.

6.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 1
6.SummaryEnglish: Hazuki and Aiko discuss how time went by, and how now they have become middle school students. When Hazuki mentions that things they used to never give thought to are suddenly important, Aiko admits that she has no clue what she's speaking of. Hazuki points out that before they would ride their brooms freely as a young witch apprentice, but now with the advancement in technology and science -like cellular devices, security camera's- it's not nearly as easy.

7.SummaryEnglish: Doremi suggests that as they have officially made the Maho-do Comedy Group, they should come up with a Straight Man and Idiot routine.

8.SummaryEnglish: The girls do an Association Quiz, in which the host (Hazuki) gives the contestants (the other girls) a hint, and the contestants must try to guess the correct word association.

9.SummaryEnglish: The girls are concerned about Doremi, who has been down since earlier an ask if she's okay. She brings up Naniganandemo Steak House, a popular new eatery by the station.

10.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 2
10.SummaryEnglish: Pop and Onpu discuss how things have changed as they got older when the discussion of romance pops up.

11.SummaryEnglish: The girls decide to have dinner together but struggle coming up with a choice they agree on.

12.SummaryEnglish: The girls prepare for a Joke Battle but keep getting sidetracked after finding out Doremi will be the Host.

13.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 3
13.SummaryEnglish: Doremi and Momoko discuss the previous episodes of things that have changed between the days of their youth.

14.SummaryEnglish: Majorika is Doremi and Pop's toy for the day.

16.SummaryEnglish: Momoko decides to speak English for the audience, and Doremi will be her interpreter.

17.SummaryEnglish: Yada-kun shows up at the shop one day and Momoko attempts to help him.

18.SummaryEnglish: The girls try another Joke battle, with Doremi now replaced by Hazuki as host.

19.SummaryEnglish: Pop comes across Kotake one late day and decides to talk about his relationship with Doremi.

20.SummaryEnglish: When Hana-chan visits the Maho-Dou with a crystal ball the Queen gave her, Momoko and Hazuki question her about what she has been doing with the ball.

21.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 4

26.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 5

27.TitleEnglish: What if, Ai-chan was raised in Tokyo

28.TitleEnglish: The Present is the Past - Part 6

34.TitleEnglish: Heartwarming Theater 04: The Magic of Words♪

1.TitleEnglish: I'm Doremi! I'm a Witch Apprentice
1.SummaryEnglish: Doremi Harukaze comes across a magic shop and calls out the owner, Majorika, for being a witch, turning the latter into a witch frog. Now, she must become a witch apprentice herself to return Majorika to her normal self.

2.SummaryEnglish: Doremi and her best friend Hazuki Fujiwara want to swap lives for a day, as they both feel that the other is luckier. However, this leads to a few consequences.

3.TitleEnglish: The Transfer Student from Naniwa! Aiko Debuts
3.SummaryEnglish: A new girl named Aiko Senōō from Osaka transfers to Doremi's class and unintentionally upsets Doremi and Hazuki at first. Once Doremi gets to know her, she befriends her and tries to find ways to cheer her up on Parents' Day at school.

4.TitleEnglish: It's Not Scary If We're All Witches
4.SummaryEnglish: Hazuki and Aiko find out Doremi's secret of being a witch apprentice after the stunt she pulls on Parents' Day, so they must also become witch apprentices to protect Doremi. The three girls redecorate the magic shop with a more cheerful design after Doremi accidentally destroys the shop.

5.SummaryEnglish: After fixing up the magic shop and dubbing it Mahōdō, the girls await their first customers and are visited by a singing witch wholesaler Dela.

6.SummaryEnglish: Nobuko Yokokawa is a liar in the girls' class, but nevertheless amuses everyone with her imaginative stories. When Aiko believes in her and realizes she lied, she becomes very hurt.

7.SummaryEnglish: The three girls prepare to take their first witch exam, but Doremi must spend the day supervising her younger sister Pop. Pop wants to go to her grandparent's house by train by herself. When it comes to exam time, Hazuki and Aiko earn fairies for passing the exam. Doremi fails the exam, so she doesn't get a fairy.

8.SummaryEnglish: After failing to pass the level 9 exam, Doremi is given another chance. Her goal is to find medicine for Motamota. Luckily, Doremi passes and gets her fairy, but she does it with the help of Aiko and Hazuki, who come to see her out of worry.

9.TitleEnglish: Where Did You Go!? Fairy Dodo
9.SummaryEnglish: Doremi's fairy Dodo runs off after being scolded, so the girls use their new magic spell, Magical Stage, to try and find her.

10.SummaryEnglish: Miss Seki and the vice principal drop by the magic shop after photos of the girls working there arise.

11.TitleEnglish: Early Riser Girl Marina And A Bouquet from the Heart
11.SummaryEnglish: After being insulted by Takao Kimura, Marina Koizumi refuses to take care of the school's flowers. Hazuki is determined to help Marina realize Kimura is remorseful.

12.TitleEnglish: A Wish For A Precious Shirt
12.SummaryEnglish: A young boy named Misaki Shibayama trades in his favorite shirt to get a charm to help his older brother Daichi play in a soccer game.

13.SummaryEnglish: The girls take the Level 8 Exam in which they have three hours to clear three obstacles unknowingly chosen beforehand.

14.SummaryEnglish: Naomi Okuyama is insulted by the SOS Trio for showing her feminine side and refuses to forgive them until they make her laugh.

15.SummaryEnglish: Majorika gets purchased by Pop. Pop treats Majorika like a plush toy and she takes her to school one day.

16.SummaryEnglish: Doremi's father takes her and her friends on a fishing trip with a young boy who shares his passion.

17.SummaryEnglish: Masaru Yada gets arrested, and no one else besides Hazuki and Miss Seki believes that he did nothing wrong. With Miss Seki's job on the line, Doremi, Hazuki and Aiko use their magic to find out if the rumors behind Yada are true.

18.TitleEnglish: Don't Use That! The Forbidden Magic
18.SummaryEnglish: After a fluke grants them immediate success on the Level 7 Exam, the girls find out that Nanako Okada refuses to take care of the school's rabbits and use their new powers to find out why. They learn that Nanako once lost her puppy and is afraid to have another pet because she thinks the same thing might happen.

19.SummaryEnglish: On the last day without magic for breaking the laws of the Witch World, Hazuki is kidnapped by two conmen and only Doremi and Aiko can rescue her.

20.TitleEnglish: The Rival Makes Her Appearnce! The Mahō-dōu is in Big Trouble!!
20.SummaryEnglish: Majorika loses her shop to Dela in a card game, and her arch-rival Majoruka takes over.

21.TitleEnglish: Majo Ruka's Goods are Filled with Danger
21.SummaryEnglish: After noticing that the people around them are becoming ill due to Majoruka's charms, Aiko, Doremi, and Hazuki use their magic to break the spell.

22.TitleEnglish: The Road to the Level 6 Witch is Long!?
22.SummaryEnglish: With the shop under enemy control, the girls must find a way to get in to take their Level 6 Exam.

23.SummaryEnglish: After her father gives Aiko a new harmonica and decides to throw away the old, cherished one, she runs off to Hazuki's house. There, they find an extra magic bead, which they use to gain entrance to their exam.

24.SummaryEnglish: The girls get a hold of Majoruka's crystal ball and are challenged to a magical duel for control of the shop.

25.SummaryEnglish: Pop is appointed as a witch apprentice after witnessing her sister and friends perform magic. She uses magic to create ghosts at her kindergarten sleepover, and Doremi, Hazuki, and Aiko help clean up her mess.

26.SummaryEnglish: When returning the injured Kanae Īda to her father's steak shop, Doremi and the others discover the pall of bad luck covering the place and set out to uncover the mystery. They are appointed as Pureleine by the Queen to capture Bad Cards, as they have hearts pure enough to be able to do so.

27.SummaryEnglish: The girls receive the Purelein Personal Computer from the Queen to capture the Bad Cards that exist in the Human World. Upon start-up, they are introduced to Oyajīde, the captive wizard who let loose the cards.

28.TitleEnglish: Love is a Windy Ride Over a Plateau
28.SummaryEnglish: Doremi comes across a cute tennis player named Yutaka Kashiwag at Hazuki's summer house and falls head over heels for him, but her snobby classmate Reika Tamaki also has an eye on him.

29.TitleEnglish: The Tap Disappeared at the Festival!
29.SummaryEnglish: Doremi accidentally loses her tap at the Summer Festival.

30.TitleEnglish: I Want to Meet the Ghost!
30.SummaryEnglish: Doremi, Hazuki, Aiko, and their classmates head to Nobuaki Yamauchi's temple to share ghost stories and test their courage.

31.SummaryEnglish: Upon returning to school from summer vacation, the girls become interested in their classmate Shino Hanada's trip to Mongolia. At the same time, they are due to take the Level 5 Exam.

32.TitleEnglish: Defeat Tamaki! The Class President Election
32.SummaryEnglish: Masaharu Miyamoto, with the support of Doremi and her friends, challenges Tamaki's bid for class president.

33.TitleEnglish: Much Panic at the Athletic Meet!
33.SummaryEnglish: It's the day of the school's Sports Festival, but trouble begins to plague the events.

34.TitleEnglish: I Want to See My Mother!
34.SummaryEnglish: Aiko's mother comes to visit, but she is unable to face her daughter. Upon finding out, Aiko heads to her mother's house in Hannan City to meet her.

35.TitleEnglish: The Transfer Student is a Witch Apprentice!?
35.SummaryEnglish: The famous pop star and child actress Onpu Segawa becomes the new student in class. After a local audition, the girls find out that she is a witch apprentice under Majoruka.

36.SummaryEnglish: For the Level 4 Exam, the witch apprentices must race the Witch World's fastest hare and tortoise through an obstacle course.

37.SummaryEnglish: An intense storm in the Witch World blows a group of magic frogs into the Human World, and the girls must return them before anyone finds out.

38.TitleEnglish: Ryōta and the Monster of the Night
38.SummaryEnglish: Ryōta Hayashi is obsessed with monsters, specifically Gazamadon, and everyone scolds him for it. He becomes so upset, he puts all his monster goods away.

39.TitleEnglish: Doremi's Boyfriend is a Middle School Student!
39.SummaryEnglish: When Maki Higuchi's brother in middle school, Shūzou Higuchi, sees Onpu in her witch apprentice outfit, she uses her magic to make him fall in love with someone else, which turns out to be Doremi.

40.TitleEnglish: Doremi Wins Easily? The Level 3 Exam
40.SummaryEnglish: The girls go to take the Level 3 Exam, hoping to pass so they can be granted each a seedling that eventually sprouts into a tree and yields an endless supply of magic spheres. Surprisingly, the exam is one they will have to take separately. They each must pass through a door into their own world to encounter a series of events that will test their own individual strengths and are only allowed to use magic twice. The girls also must also complete the exam in one hour or else they will fail.

41.TitleEnglish: Father and Son, the Move Towards Victory!
41.SummaryEnglish: Shōta Taniyama loves the game shogi and is able to defeat the vice-principal, but his parents are against his desire to play. With the help of Miss Seki, they allow him to play in an upcoming tournament. Taniyama makes it to the final round but becomes nervous whenever he touches a certain piece. Doremi, Hazuki, and Aiko use this clue to identify the presence of a Bad Card.

42.SummaryEnglish: Kōta Amano, a boy obsessed with hero shows, is challenged to a fight by an upperclassman, who mistakenly believes he is dating Onpu.

43.TitleEnglish: Tearful Memories of Papa and the Fireworks
43.SummaryEnglish: Tamaki decides to run away after thinking her father doesn't care because he never punishes her. She is accompanied by Shiori Nakayama, who has been out of school due to illness and also has problems with her father.

44.TitleEnglish: I Want to Be a Female Pro Wrestler!
44.SummaryEnglish: Mutsumi Kudō, the strongest fighter in class, looks up to professional wrestler Candy Itō but becomes disappointed when she announces a possible retirement.

45.SummaryEnglish: An ailing Santa Claus enlists the help of Doremi and the girls to deliver presents.

46.SummaryEnglish: The girls help Michiaki Watabe with his magic show when his father is unable to. For the Level 2 Exam, Doremi and friends are given the task of entertaining a group of witches at a talent show.

47.SummaryEnglish: Aiko's father's boss arranges a meeting with his daughter Midori for a possible marriage, but Aiko is not ready for another mother.

48.TitleEnglish: Onpu's E-Mail was a Love Letter?
48.SummaryEnglish: Gōji Nakata becomes one of the many victims of a prank e-mail sent by Hehe asking for a date with Onpu.

49.TitleEnglish: I Want to Meet Papa! The Dream Placed on the Overnight Express
49.SummaryEnglish: Onpu's father, whom Onpu hasn't seen in six months, is conducting a new express train. So, she tries to get through her audition to meet him before he leaves again.

50.SummaryEnglish: The Level 1 Exam gives the girls the task of using magic to help someone and receiving thanks. However, things take a turn for the worse when their secret is discovered and spread around town.

51.SummaryEnglish: Onpu uses her magic to make everyone forget about what they discovered but is punished into a hundred-year sleep because of it. Doremi, Hazuki, and Aiko must decide if they will give up being witches to save their friend.

1.SummaryEnglish: When Doremi, Hazuki, Aiko, and Onpu travel to the Witch World to visit Majo Rika, they inadvertently walk into the Queen's garden and encounter a baby born from a special rose. They are given their powers back and are asked to take care of the newborn for a year.

2.TitleEnglish: Raising a Baby is a Lot of Trouble!
2.SummaryEnglish: At the new Flower Garden MAHO Dou, the girls are both making preparations for the grand opening and taking care of Hana at the same time. Luckily, Doremi's mother comes by and properly instructs them on how to take care of Hana.

3.TitleEnglish: Don't Fall Asleep! Pop's Witch Apprentice Exam
3.SummaryEnglish: With the announcement of a Level 9 Exam for new witch apprentices. Pop decides to take care of Hana for the night to prepare herself.

4.SummaryEnglish: Although Doremi uses her magic to get two quarreling friends to make up, her deed causes Hana to become ill.

5.SummaryEnglish: When the girls see the iconic ivy of Miss Seki's old high school wilting, they do all they can to fix it in time for the graduation ceremony.

6.TitleEnglish: Lies and Truth in Flower Language
6.SummaryEnglish: Takao Kimura won't admit his crush on Marina Koizumi in front of the SOS Trio, and his stubborn action causes a rift to form between them.

7.SummaryEnglish: Just like their witch apprentice exams from before, Hana must undergo monthly health examinations, with the first one coming up very shortly. During the exam, the girls go to great lengths to make sure Hana passes or else they will never she her again.

8.TitleEnglish: Across Time, In Search of Onpu's Mama's Secret!
8.SummaryEnglish: Onpu and her friends use the power of Magical Stage to find out why her mother will not allow her to perform at a venue.

9.TitleEnglish: The Search for the Herbs! Maho-dou's Bus Trip
9.SummaryEnglish: Majo Rika and the girls go on a trip to find a certain herb that Hana needs to cure her hiccups and come across Majo Rika's mother, Majo Ririka.

10.SummaryEnglish: Nobuko has written a new story about Aiko and her friends, and the others take turns inputting their own bit into the story.

11.SummaryEnglish: Reiko Fujiwara wants her daughter to learn traditional Japanese dance, but Hazuki can't say no to her mother's request.

12.SummaryEnglish: The day of the second health examination has arrived, and the girls must try their best to complete tasks without accumulating three yellow cards, which will fail them immediately.

13.SummaryEnglish: Sebastian Shinzou Osawa, son of one of the sponsors of Onpu's event, asks Doremi to marry him, to which she obviously accepts.

14.TitleEnglish: Pop's First Love? Her Beloved Jyunichi-sensei!
14.SummaryEnglish: Pop grows affection for her new P.E. teacher, Mr. Jyunichi.

15.TitleEnglish: Mother's Day and the Drawing of Mother
15.SummaryEnglish: Shiori, who is motherless, and Masaru, who doesn't care much for his, decide to skip school after being asked to draw them as an art project.

16.TitleEnglish: First Time Crawling!? Big Panic at the Harukaze's!
16.SummaryEnglish: Doremi and Pop take Hana home to give Majo Rika and Lala a break, but the baby's newly discovered crawling ability makes things very difficult.

17.SummaryEnglish: Conveniently enough, the third health examination challenges the baby's ability to crawl.

18.SummaryEnglish: Dodo rebels and once again flies away when Doremi works her too hard.

19.SummaryEnglish: Doremi and Hazuki argue about how to properly take care of Hana, but any attempt of getting the two to make up only makes things worse.

20.TitleEnglish: I Can Meet Mom! Aiko's Tearful Reunion
20.SummaryEnglish: Aiko's mother invites her daughter to stay with her for the night, where she learns more about what led to the divorce.

21.TitleEnglish: The Misanthropist Majo Don and The Promise of The Herb
21.SummaryEnglish: After easily passing the fourth health examination, Majo Heart asks the girls to retrieve lavender from the human-hating CFO of the Witch World, Majo Don.

22.SummaryEnglish: With the passage between the Witch and Wizard Worlds now opened, Oyajiide is tasked with capturing Hana.

23.TitleEnglish: Using new powers to Rescue Hana-chan!
23.SummaryEnglish: After failing to get Hana from the clutches of Oyajiide, the Queen grants them access to more powerful magic to be used when the baby is in danger.

24.SummaryEnglish: Kotake and Kimura want to enter a sumo tournament to win a video game and get the fried bread-loving Susumu Yanagita to join them.

25.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Pretty Boy, Akatsuki-kun Appears!
25.SummaryEnglish: A young wizard named Akatsuki is sent out to aid Oyajiide's kidnapping efforts and decides to use Doremi to get to Hana.

26.SummaryEnglish: Since her swimsuit from last year no longer fits, Kanae Iida decides to go on a diet and asks Doremi for help. Coincidentally, the next Health Examination for Hana checks the baby's appetite.

27.TitleEnglish: The Herb from the North and the Precious Memories
27.SummaryEnglish: Majo Ririka comes for a visit, and everyone goes to Hokkaido to find magic marigolds to cure Hana's rash. While there, they come across Doremi's father fishing with an unknown woman.

28.TitleEnglish: Health Examination Full of Hidden Dangers
28.SummaryEnglish: Oyajiide sneaks into the next health examination to once again capture the infant.

29.TitleEnglish: Everyone Disappears During the Test of Courage!?
29.SummaryEnglish: Once again the class, this time with Tamaki, make a trip to Yamauchi's temple to test their courage.

30.SummaryEnglish: Miss Seki has gotten a boyfriend over the summer, so Doremi and the others try to find out just how great a person he is.

31.TitleEnglish: The FLAT 4 Arrive from the Wizard World!
31.SummaryEnglish: Fujio, Leon, and Tooru, three more young wizards, join Akatsuki (together known as the FLAT 4) and Oyajiide in their question to retrieve the magic baby, while the girls prepare for the seventh health examination.

32.TitleEnglish: Fly Away! Dodo and the Other Fairies' Big Transformation
32.SummaryEnglish: While Dodo and the other fairies become trapped and transform in the new laptop given to the girls by the Queen, the FLAT 4 successfully kidnap Hana and put the blame on the unknowing Oyajiide. There is profanity in the episode when one of the man holding an anpan says "Damn."

33.TitleEnglish: Say Cheese During the Class Trip!
33.SummaryEnglish: On a school trip, Kaori takes charge of taking pictures, but she goes overboard and produces some embarrassing photos of everyone.

34.TitleEnglish: Takoyaki is the Taste of Making Up
34.SummaryEnglish: Aiko and Onpu argue with each other after Aiko misunderstands the importance of the idol's feelings.

35.TitleEnglish: Aim for the Top in the Sports Festival!
35.SummaryEnglish: The kindergardeners are preparing for the athletic meet. During practice, it's revealed that Kimitaka has a few cooperation and balance problems.

36.TitleEnglish: Aiko and her Rival! Sports Showdown!!
36.SummaryEnglish: The athletic Leon of the FLAT 4 challenges Aiko to all sorts of sports, while Hana wanders off chasing a dragonfly.

37.TitleEnglish: Hana-chan and Pop are Both Taking Examinations!
37.SummaryEnglish: Hana's next health examination and Pop's Level 4 apprentice test occur at the same time. Hana's actions begin to affect Pop's test.

38.SummaryEnglish: Hazuki is chosen to direct the class play for the talent show, but encounters difficulties when she is unable to make her own decisions.

39.TitleEnglish: A Selfish Child and the Angry Monster
39.SummaryEnglish: After Hana passes another health examination, Doremi, Hazuki, and Aiko go to see Onpu's filming in Kyoto. The kid who plays Onpu's brother, Chikara, gets jealous of Onpu spending more time with Doremi and the others.

40.TitleEnglish: The Piano Comes to the Harukaze House!
40.SummaryEnglish: After the events of the Sharp movie, Pop asks her mother to teach her how to play the piano.

41.TitleEnglish: Chase After Onpu! The Path to Becoming an Idol!
41.SummaryEnglish: Tooru tries to become an idol like Onpu, but fails in every way. Oyajiide attempts another kidnapping.

42.TitleEnglish: The Witch Who Does Not Cast Magic
42.SummaryEnglish: Majo Heart is revealed to have an adopted daughter, Majo Ran. Majo Ran refuses to use magic, and is trying to get to the Queen's castle.

43.SummaryEnglish: Because Majo Rika and Lala are ill, the girls take Hana to school.

44.SummaryEnglish: The girls get to spend time with their families on Christmas Eve. Although there are happy times, there are sad times as well.

45.TitleEnglish: Ojamajo Period Drama: The Young Girls Show Their Valor!
45.SummaryEnglish: The girls go into a Storybook world, with the characters portrayed by notable people during the season.

46.TitleEnglish: The Last Examination - Hana-chan's Mamas Will Protect Her!
46.SummaryEnglish: During the final Health Exam, the girls are taken away by the FLAT 4. Their thoughts are clouded, yet they carry out their duty of kidnapping Hana. Can Doremi get through to them?

47.TitleEnglish: Give Back Hana-chan! The Great Magic Battle
47.SummaryEnglish: It's the girls against Oyajiide and Ojijide as they race against the clock for the fate of the Witch and Wizard worlds and Hana.

48.SummaryEnglish: Picking up from the last episode, the past Queen of the Witch World curses Hana, making her very ill. There is an only thing that can cure her, the Love Supreme flower in a cursed forest, but if she isn't cured, Hana will die.

49.SummaryEnglish: The four witch apprentices go in to the forest and retrieve the Love Supreme flower, however the previous queen tries to stop them. Doremi finally gets the flower and Hana is saved, but they fall asleep for 1000 years. Hana calls out to them, which awakens her mothers. When they saved Hana, their crystals break. They can't see Hana again because of this, and they part ways.

2.TitleEnglish: Momoko Cried!? The Secret Behind the Piercing

3.TitleEnglish: I Hate You! But I Would Like To Be Your Friend!

10.TitleEnglish: I Don't Want to Become an Adult!

13.TitleEnglish: I Want to Ride the Ship of Dreams!

14.TitleEnglish: An Up and Down Happy Birthday

15.TitleEnglish: Do you like Your Beautiful Mother? Or Hate Her?

16.TitleEnglish: Just Being Delicious is Not Enough!?

17.TitleEnglish: Her Destined Rival!! Harukaze and Tamaki

19.TitleEnglish: Nothing but Fights, Like Father, Like Son

24.TitleEnglish: Rock and Roll in the Music Club!?

26.TitleEnglish: Deliver Her Feelings! Aiko Goes to Osaka

28.TitleEnglish: All Sorts of Dangers at the Witch Kindergarten!

29.TitleEnglish: Terror! The Curse of the Well

30.TitleEnglish: Please Give Us the Illusionary Recipe!

31.TitleEnglish: We'll Cure It! Her Hatred of Vegetables!

33.TitleEnglish: Undefeatable!? Ojamajo Lends a Helping Hand

38.TitleEnglish: I Want to Go to School!

39.TitleEnglish: The School Performance! Who'll be the Main Character?

41.TitleEnglish: Visiting the Village of Magic Frogs

42.TitleEnglish: Heartpounding! The Mysterious Magic of the Twins

46.TitleEnglish: A Messed Up Magical Year-End Celebration

1.TitleEnglish: A Surprised Doremi! The New Ojamajo
1.SummaryEnglish: When Hana misses her mothers, she lets out a cry, thereby transforming Maho-Dou and transforming herself into an 11-year-old. Shortly after, Hana goes to the Human World to attend Doremi's school and shocks the Ojamajos with her new look.

2.SummaryEnglish: Hana begins sixth grade, but cannot read or write.

3.SummaryEnglish: Pop is due to take her Level 2 exam and Hana is due to take her Level 9 exam. When Pop witnesses Hana pass her Level 9 exam, she gets jealous at how fast she is progressing.

4.SummaryEnglish: The MAHO-Dou is getting less money than normal from the reopening. Hana tries to solve the problem on her own.

5.SummaryEnglish: Onpu, tired from her busy life, cannot see her father. Hana breaks her promise with her and pretends to be Onpu to go to her fashion shoots.

6.TitleEnglish: The Mystery Combo Of Class Librarians!?
6.SummaryEnglish: Hana meets a girl who is fond of books, so she uses magic to send them inside the story.

7.TitleEnglish: Open Up! The Door to Your Heart
7.SummaryEnglish: One of Majo Tourbillon's children loved seashells. To remove a cursed bramble from her, they make a seashell necklace and open the door to her heart.

8.TitleEnglish: Did They Figure it Out!? Hana-chan's Secret
8.SummaryEnglish: Nobuko and Miho create a manga called "Hana's Secret", which is about Hana being a witch.

9.SummaryEnglish: Hadzuki feels that she and Yada are becoming distant as he becomes closer to Shiori.

10.TitleEnglish: School Trip!! It's Tough Being The Group Leader
10.SummaryEnglish: For the upcoming field trip to Nara and Kyoto, Hana volunteers to be leader for her group. However, she has yet to learn what the responsibilities mean.

11.SummaryEnglish: On the class study trip to Nara, Doremi and the girls meet up with the FLAT4 again.

12.SummaryEnglish: As the class settles in Kyoto, Kotake tries to protect Doremi from Akatsuki. Hana is turned back into a baby and the girls must hide her for the night.

13.SummaryEnglish: Mutsumi wants to retire pro-wrestling after seeing her wrestling idol, Candy, retire.

14.SummaryEnglish: Hana goes through her level 7 witch exam.

15.SummaryEnglish: As Mother's Day approaches, Hadzuki and Onpu get upset with their mothers.

16.TitleEnglish: How to Make a Rainbow That Doesn't Disappear
16.SummaryEnglish: A rainy day helps Baba remember one of Majo Tourbillon's children. The rainbow that comes after gives the girls an idea for removing a bramble from the Past Queen.

17.SummaryEnglish: Doremi and the girls find out that the boys in the 6th grade are hiding out in a secret clubhouse, home of Miyamae's homemade airplanes. The girls offer to help out, but unfortunately, Reika hears of this and tries to exploit them.

18.TitleEnglish: Where There Are Woofs, There Is Love
18.SummaryEnglish: Nishizawa falls in love with a younger man who works at a pet shop. After over hearing about how she lied about owning a dog, Hana becomes a dog to help her out.

19.SummaryEnglish: The girls decide to give the daughter of a sushi bar owner and the daughter of a bath house owner a break by doing they're jobs for them.

20.SummaryEnglish: The girls reflect on what they want to pursue. Momoko doesn't know what her dream is and meets a similar boy on the same search.

21.SummaryEnglish: Hana is sent to look for the missing Tortoise for her next witch exam. On the way, she runs into Oyajide, who is in the middle of his own exam that would release his punishment of working at the Witch World Preschool and allow his return back to the Wizard World.

22.SummaryEnglish: Kimitaka is moving away to Hokkaido. The day before he moves, he confesses his love for Pop.

23.SummaryEnglish: Tanabata is fast approaching, but Altair and Vega refuse to meet with one another.

24.TitleEnglish: Love and Justice! We Are the Majo Rangers!
24.SummaryEnglish: Hana is devastated that her recently favorite show, "Battle Rangers"; is coming to an end, and therefore is determined to stop this by all means.

25.TitleEnglish: They Can Create Smiles? The Mysterious Glass Cups
25.SummaryEnglish: Glass cups sent to the witch apprentices are revealed to be enchanted! Baba remembers one of the Past Queen's children due to the resemblance of the cups.

26.TitleEnglish: Heating up With Camping and Curry!?
26.SummaryEnglish: The 6th grade goes on a camping trip. During a scavenger hunt, Doremi and Kotake get lost.

27.TitleEnglish: Nice to Meet You, White Elephant!
27.SummaryEnglish: During a festival, Hana meets a white elephant who is left alone by the others. She befriends this elephant, whom she names Pao.

28.SummaryEnglish: While the others decide to do different projects for school, Hadzuki and another classmate decide to help out at a retirement home.

29.TitleEnglish: Don't Let Go! Our Connecting Hands
29.SummaryEnglish: Hana gets lost during the Summer Festival, but meets a mysterious boy and makes him promise not to let go of her hand.

30.TitleEnglish: A Suspicious Shadow!? Uneasiness Throughout the Witch World
30.SummaryEnglish: After the Queen of the Witch World falls ill while disguised, the girls go to the Witch World. They reunite with Pao as the Queen and Majo Rin look into an old legend.

31.TitleEnglish: Pao-chan Is A Troublesome Magic Elephant!?
31.SummaryEnglish: There is a legend of a White Elephant who can cure people that are cursed. Pao may be that elephant when Majo Rika falls under a curse.

32.TitleEnglish: I'm a Good Kid, But I'm Frustrated
32.SummaryEnglish: Hana becomes sick of the girls constantly keeping tabs on her. She befriends model student Sachiko, who secretly wishes her parents weren't teachers so they could spend more time with her.

33.SummaryEnglish: To everyone's surprise, Onpu does not pass a movie audition that would have made her debut in Hollywood.

34.SummaryEnglish: When Baba falls ill, she dreams of one of Majotourbillion's children as she is recovering.

35.TitleEnglish: Level 4 exam is Lo, Lo, Lo, Lo?
35.SummaryEnglish: The girls prepare Hana and her fairy, Toto, for their Level 4 exam.

36.TitleEnglish: The Bicycle That Goes Any Where
36.SummaryEnglish: Hana learns how to ride a bicycle while she and Morikawa try to cure Hiroko of her phobia of bicycles.

37.SummaryEnglish: The Wizard World has been invaded by the virus of the former witch queen.

38.TitleEnglish: Finally a Second Marriage!? Aiko's Decision
38.SummaryEnglish: Aiko and her dad go to Osaka so Aiko's dad can propose to Aiko's mom again.

40.TitleEnglish: Doremi and the Witch Stop Being Witches
40.SummaryEnglish: Doremi, who has no clue about her future, meets a retired witch named Mirai, who gives her guidance.

41.TitleEnglish: Pop Becomes a Witch Early On!?
41.SummaryEnglish: Pop takes the Level 1 exam, but becomes worried about her bond with Doremi when she has to decide whether to become a witch or stay a human.

42.TitleEnglish: I Have to Decide!? Hazuki's Road
42.SummaryEnglish: Hazuki discovers that her mother is making her take the entrance exam to Karen Girls Academy without her knowledge. Her mother shares a secret of her past as to why she did so.

43.TitleEnglish: The Level 1 Exam! Tamaki's Desperate Situation!!
43.SummaryEnglish: Tamaki falls under the virus of the Witch Queen. Hana decides to cure her for her Level 1 exam.

44.SummaryEnglish: The girls meet Robby, Roy's Grandson. Apparently, he has the final item, a tapestry, that can rid the Queen's curse.

45.SummaryEnglish: While the girls finish up the tapestry, brambles spread more and more.

46.TitleEnglish: Farewell, The Curse of the Witch-Frogs!
46.SummaryEnglish: The Queen has been set free from her curse, and faces a new future.

47.TitleEnglish: Even If You Go Far Away
47.SummaryEnglish: As Onpu is accepted into a different middle school, Momoko is given the choice to move back to New York or stay in Japan.

48.SummaryEnglish: Aiko goes to Osaka to help take care of her grandfather at the hospital. Her parents make the decision to take care of him at home, and as a result, decide to move back to Osaka.

49.SummaryEnglish: Hazuki secretly wants to apply to her dream school, but becomes conflicted over choosing her desires over staying with Doremi.

50.SummaryEnglish: The girls must make the hardest decision ever: if they become full-fledged witches, they must stay in the Witch World forever. If they don't, they can never see Hana again and never return to the Witch World until Hana becomes the new queen of the Witch World.

51.TitleEnglish: Thank You! Until We Meet Again
51.SummaryEnglish: On the day of graduation, Doremi refuses to attend school in fear of losing her friends forever. So she locks her self up in the Maho-Dou. Hana threatens to use magic, and Doremi comes out just in time before she shows everyone. In the end, after graduation, the girls send off Hana-chan, Majo Rika and the fairies with Hana promising to become the Queen fast so the can see each other again. Hana turns back into a baby when she enters the witch world. Doremi calls out to her and Hana-Chan turns around and says, "Thank you." While the theme for the original Ojamajo Doremi is played they show Momo-Chan and her parents in the airport while she says "See you. You are my best friend. I love you.(In english)" Onpu is shown with her parents in front of their car. Aiko is shown with her parents getting on the train. Hazuki is shown with Pop and (Doremi's) parents is Doremi's house. In the witch world Hana and the other babies are shown laying on Pao. Momo is shown in America showing Beth pictures of the past year with Doremi, Hana, and the others. Onpu is shown signing autographs for her fans. Aiko is shown bring tayoyaki to her dad, mom and grandpa. Hazuki is shown in a store with her mom. Her mom picks out a dress and Hazuki says 'no' and shows her something she likes. Doremi is shown giving a love-letter to someone.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kotake and a group of boys decide to bicycle to Mount Fuji. Doremi, Hazuki, and Aiko have to convince him otherwise.

2.SummaryEnglish: Momoko meets Onpu at New York and tells a story of what happened before she became a witch apprentice.

3.SummaryEnglish: The swim meet is nearing and Aiko has been chosen as Anchor for her class. There's only one problem, though...

4.SummaryEnglish: Onpu cannot decide on a role for a movie and she reflects on what made her become an idol.

5.TitleEnglish: Someone Who Knows the Sorrow ~Pop and Hana's Secret~
5.SummaryEnglish: The trouble with Hana is that she isn't potty-trained. When Pop and Hana switch bodies, that's the main thing on Pop's mind!

6.SummaryEnglish: When Baaya was younger, she fell in love at first sight with two things. The first was ballet, the other a boy.

7.TitleEnglish: I Love Taiyaki! ~The Parent and Child's Secret~
7.SummaryEnglish: The son of a Taiyaki maker is fed up with his father criticizing him, and goes to the Maho-do to start his business.

8.SummaryEnglish: When a flute is broken by an honor student with a crush, Onpu takes the blame.

9.SummaryEnglish: Momoko, inspired by two baseball lovers, makes a team of her own friends and they compete with their first team...pros!

10.SummaryEnglish: Aiko reunites with Anrima, who made a promise to her when she was younger.

11.SummaryEnglish: Once upon a time; every Valentine's Day, Hazuki and Masaru swap gifts. There's a reason why they stopped.

12.SummaryEnglish: Doremi meets a girl named Nozomi in the hospital, who is a fan of witches. She vowed to her, despite her Cancer, that she would become a Witch Apprentice.

13.TitleEnglish: The Doll That Leapt Through Time ~Doremi's Secret~
13.SummaryEnglish: Doremi meets a mysterious girl named Fami, who shares similar traits with her. And really Fami is Doremi's grandchild
